title: Jan-Harm Steenkamp
text: I found the Banggood website some months ago and when I did my first shopping there i was worried about if it will ship and will my order be in good order. 1 month later it arrived at the post office , black bag was used and inside it was wrapped for minimal damage to the goods and i recived everything. So I bought with them a lot of times because my orders are shipped correctly but i did something stupid on one parsel and i did not put a tracker on it... It got lost and i waited for 3 months to see if it will find the post office. It did not... So i contacted Banggood and i got a reply and told them the story... They asked if i would like a refund or resent the item... I asked to resend it and less than 24 hours they have resent my lost itemwith a tracking number... I trust in Banggood and I recommend this website or mobile app to my family and friends. I love Banggood and I will give 5 stars to Banggood team! Thank you Banggood
